unnormalised: Plot no. 123, mhunnllear 'prime location', main roddak itlem pois asa, tumkam GPS ani untt zai poddtto; PIN code 400078 haka 'Lost in Translation' mhunn nav dovrunk zai.
normalised: Plot number ek shambe ani tevīs, kitallak 'prime location' mhunn sangtat, main roddachea bhāir asa, tumkam G-P-S ani ek ūnt lagtele; P-I-N kod chār shambe hāzār ani sattāri āttachem nāv 'Lost in Translation' mhunn bodolchem poddttelem.
text: Plot no. 123, mhunnllear 'prime location', main roddak itlem pois asa, tumkam GPS ani untt zai poddtto; PIN code 400078 haka 'Lost in Translation' mhunn nav dovrunk zai.
